cases.description: In order to solve of unwanted lists in paragraphs with hard-wrapped numerals, we allow only lists starting with 1 to interrupt paragraphs. Thus,
cases.input:
The number of windows in my house is
14.  The number of doors is 6.
cases.htmlAnswer: The number of windows in my house is 14. The number of doors is 6.

children.contents:
The number of windows in my house is
14.  The number of doors is 6.
